privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Our privacy and personal data protection policy
privacy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data in accordance with GDPR and current regulations

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We only collect data necessary to provide our services, including name, email and contact information when you contact us or register.

dataUse.title: Data Usage
dataUse.content: We use your data to respond to your requests, improve our services and send you relevant communications, always respecting your preferences.

cookies.title: Cookies and Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our site. You can manage your preferences in your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, modify, delete your data and limit their processing. Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any privacy questions, contact us at privacy@yourbusinessinitaly.com
